title: Could Remco Evenepoel Win the Tour of Flanders?: ‘Bring him to the Kwaremont, You Never Know’
content:
'Flanders is now a climber's race': Cobbles guru Wilfried Peeters believes Belgian superstar will race De Ronde when the time is right.

Read the full article at Could Remco Evenepoel Win the Tour of Flanders?: ‘Bring him to the Kwaremont, You Never Know’ on Velo.
author: ahood
